holidays.title: Yom Kippur
holidays.description: Otherwise known as the Day of Atonement, Yom Kippur is considered the holiest day in Judaism.

holidays.title: Ayudha Puja
holidays.description: Celebrate Ayudha Puja and explore the fascinating mythology behind this unique Indian festival.

holidays.title: Dashain
holidays.description: Let us celebrate this time of year when families come together and extend kindness to others.

holidays.title: Day of Respect For Cultural Diversity
holidays.description: Join us as we honor and celebrate cultures from all over the world.

holidays.title: Día de la Raza
holidays.description: A celebration of identity and cultures.

holidays.title: Durga Puja Navami
holidays.description: Let’s see how Navami is celebrated on the ninth day of this holiday.

holidays.title: Equatorial Guinea Independence Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to celebrate Equatorial Guinea Independence Day!

holidays.title: Harry Potter Book Day
holidays.description: Calling all witches, wizards, and muggles to celebrate this memorable day with us!

holidays.title: Hispanic Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to learn more about and celebrate Hispanic Day.

holidays.title: I Love Yarn Day
holidays.description: Yarn lovers, gather around and share your love. The world needs a little more yarn.

holidays.title: Indigenous Resistance Day
holidays.description: Today is an excellent opportunity to listen to indigenous communities and learn something new.

holidays.title: Indigenous Resistance Day in Venezuela
holidays.description: Learn the origin of Indigenous Resistance Day in Venezuela and how to celebrate it.

holidays.title: International African Penguin Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get your flippers ready as we enter the world of one of nature’s most endearing birds.

holidays.title: Lady of Aparecida
holidays.description: Here’s all you need to know about Nossa Senhora Aparecida and her origins.

holidays.title: Maha Navami
holidays.description: Get ready to light ‘diyas’ (lamps), learn about Hindu myths, and try delicious Indian sweets.

holidays.title: Mahanavami
holidays.description: We celebrate this nine-day holiday with tremendous zeal and appreciation, particularly in North and West India.

holidays.title: Mexico: Day of the Pluricultural Nation
holidays.description: The beauty of Mexico lies in its diversity and rich culture that came along with unity.

holidays.title: National Chess Day
holidays.description: Mentally stimulate and challenge yourself by playing the timeless game of chess.

holidays.title: National Costume Swap Day
holidays.description: Get ready to make heads turn as we pick out the best costumes for you.

holidays.title: National Freethought Day
holidays.description: The ability to form rational thoughts is one of the defining traits of being human.

holidays.title: National Gumbo Day
holidays.description: It’s a time to appreciate this heavily seasoned, savory state dish of Louisiana.

holidays.title: National Motorcycle Ride Day
holidays.description: Gear up to go on a biking adventure of a lifetime.

holidays.title: National Pulled Pork Day
holidays.description: Pork. Cooked. Slowly. Celebrate this classic Texas-style dish, and bring along your favorite barbecue sauce!

holidays.title: National Savings Day
holidays.description: There are lots of easier ways to save in order to bring your dreams within reach.

holidays.title: National Vermont Day
holidays.description: Explore the vast history, alluring mountains, and prolific culture of Vermont with your loved ones today.

holidays.title: Our Lady of Aparecida's Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Our Lady of Aparecida's Day by bringing a fresh wish to the church.

holidays.title: Universal Music Day
holidays.description: Join the symphony as we celebrate this day with music.

holidays.title: Uruguay Day of Cultural Diversity/Day of the Races
holidays.description: A day of acknowledgment, respect, and dignity for Latin American native people.

holidays.title: Vijayadashami
holidays.description: Vijaydashmi, or Dusshera is the 10th and the last day of Durga Puja.

holidays.title: World Arthritis Day
holidays.description: It's time to raise awareness about the debilitating and widespread effects of arthritis.

holidays.title: World Hospice and Palliative Care Day
holidays.description: It started as a single concert titled "Come and Sing" and become a worldwide event.

holidays.title: Aleister Crowley’s Birthday
holidays.description: To the man who introduced Thelema — that promotes harmony with nature and your own calling.

holidays.title: Alyssa Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Instagram star is slowly but surely rising in the industry! Let's celebrate her.

holidays.title: Darci Lynne Farmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: She also won Broadway, Specialty Acts, and the overall Entertainer of the Year at American Kids.

holidays.title: Dick Gregory’s Birthday
holidays.description: We look back at Dick Gregory’s life and get inspired to keep moving forward.

holidays.title: Eisha Hickson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Eisha Hickson is an emerging talent from Atlanta, Georgia and we’re happy to celebrate her today.

holidays.title: Erica Dixon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star is creating a body of work she be proud of.

holidays.title: Hugh Jackman’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor, philanthropist, and sports lover is loved in the entertainment world.

holidays.title: Josh Hutcherson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Talented and loved, he will always be everyone’s favorite. Let's celebrate Josh Hutcherson today!

holidays.title: Kelvin Dukes’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s one of the youngest people to make it to the quarterfinals of America’s Got Talent.

holidays.title: Kirk Cameron’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor adorned the living rooms of thousands of people worldwide.

holidays.title: Lane Frost’s Birthday
holidays.description: His legend lives on. Let’s celebrate the life and legacy of Lane Frost on his birthday.

holidays.title: Tahlia Christou’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate this bikini model who also happens to be a weightlifter!

holidays.title: Tyson Jenkins’s Birthday
holidays.description: He started his social media career in 2016 by opening an account on TikTok.
